class_notes: This class meets in person TTh, with an additional in-person Friday session at the same time in a location TBA.
course_description: This is the first of two courses designed to introduce students to modern Mandarin Chinese. The course begins with an introduction to the sound system of Mandarin Chinese and moves on to basic skills in listening, speaking, reading and writing, and an introduction to Chinese culture.
